ctl:suite.ctl:description: Lots of talk about test status

ctl:test.name: wmts:Start
ctl:test.ctl:assertion: WMTS client and/or server tests are executed.

ctl:test.name: wmts:Bootstrap
ctl:test.ctl:assertion: The WMTS Server supports either or both KVP GET or RESTful GetCapabilities mandatory Requests

ctl:test.name: wmts:BootstrapKVPGET
ctl:test.ctl:assertion: The WMTS Server supports KVP GET GetCapabilities mandatory Requests

ctl:test.name: wmts:BootstrapRESTful
ctl:test.ctl:assertion: The WMTS Server supports RESTful GETCapabilities mandatory Requests

ctl:test.name: wmts:GetCapabilitiesKVPGET
ctl:test.ctl:assertion: The WMTS Server supports KVP GET GetCapabilities mandatory and optional Requests

ctl:test.name: wmts:GetCapabilitiesMandatoryKVPGET
ctl:test.ctl:assertion: The WMTS Server supports KVP GET GetCapabilities mandatory and optional Requests

ctl:test.name: wmts:GetCapabilitiesOptionalKVPGET
ctl:test.ctl:assertion: The WMTS Server supports KVP GET GetCapabilities mandatory and optional Requests
